{
    "pattern": "CREATE TABLE t(c0 <text_type_parameter>); BEGIN; REPLACE INTO t <dml_values_parameter>; DELETE FROM t <dml_condition_replace>; COMMIT;",
    "applied_rules": [
        "<text_type_parameter>",
        "<dml_values_parameter>",
        "<dml_condition_replace>"
    ],
    "Affected Elements": "DELETE statement, CAST function",
    "Root Cause Analysis": "The DELETE statement fails due to an incorrect datetime value generated by the CAST function when using TIDB_VERSION()."
